channel.title: Wilderness & free trade coming back 1st feb
channel.description:
Thank you to all those of you who took part in the historic RuneScape Referendum, which ended on Friday. We received an incredible 1.2 million votes, with a united 91% of you voting for the restoration of free trade and the Wilderness. We have heard your call and will be restoring these much loved features to RuneScape on Tuesday 1st February. The clock is ticking and you have just two weeks to get ready for this monumental update. To help you prepare, we will be releasing a series of guides, FAQs and expert advice about the Wilderness and free trade, so that players both old and new can get ready for this epic release. Now it is up to you to prepare for battle, level your account, gear up your armour and equip yourself for the ultimate Wilderness experience. There is just one question left unanswered: are you ready? Mark Gerhard and the RuneScape Team
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/the-wilderness-and-free-trade-will-return I think I might need to change my underwear.

item.title: Wilderness & free trade coming back 1st feb
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Speljohan:

I won’t need to scam people are free trade means i’ll become elitist-rich anyway. What this will do however, is make the community a lot tighter, and i intend to be very generous when it comes to shit in-game (i always had a soft spot for watching a noob cum all over himself after providing him with 100k cash)

haha lol I remember I used to keep a lot of cheap junk in my bank and there would always be like a level 100+ guy in a bank who is always in a rush and offers like 10k for a knife or a pie dish or shit like that - really liked their generosity, if it was me I’d have walked to the nearest general store (regardless how far it was) cuz I’m noob…

Read full topic
item.source: Wilderness & free trade coming back 1st feb

item.title: Wilderness & free trade coming back 1st feb
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:43, topic:378770”][quote author=Mr Mopar X link=topic=474629.msg3471692#msg3471692 date=1295336676]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=474629.msg3471688#msg3471688 date=1295336437]

I can not wait until free trade. I have a close friend who I have know since I began playing who will be providing me with a H’Ween mask set (Value of around 300M) to merchant with since I am low on coins due to 95 Prayer. My average day would pull in a worth of about 30M a day. Now, I will be merching with 7X’s that amount so hopefully I can expect much more.
[/quote]I have about 8b spread out on various accounts Max out all pay skills kthx

Wow, very nice. I believe the most wealth I have possessed was at the peak of my slayer career, which
was a total of around 800M (Around 1.1B with the current prices). I was good at making money, but not holding on to it.
[/quote]On my main i don’t even have 100m wealth… Just waiting for free trade so i can get the acc up and kicking, then out to troll/grief people :)[/quote]

I try to be an upstanding player, but I must admit I love doing that as well. >:]

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness & free trade coming back 1st feb
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

rova1:

-or getting a mate to stand at varrock east bank for example and getting him to spam “buying [something shit] 1m!” and then you stand at center or near west bank and spamming “selling [something shit] 500k!” and of course greedy noob thinks to himself “easy 500k!” and buys it only for your friend to say “ah nvm already got”

I remember falling for that. I spent 400k on a godamn red bead.

Read full topic
item.source: Wilderness & free trade coming back 1st feb

item.title: Wilderness & free trade coming back 1st feb
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

Why the fuck do they make us wait like this? Faggots! That’s poor planning because even a retard could have predicted what the poll results would be like…

Trading scams are hard because of the warnings shit, IMO luring or 2-person scams are more successful:

-anyone remember convincing a kid with a whip to take a death for a video you’re making in exchange for 400k… only for the reward to be 4 d longs or mystic tops provided before he dies (bye bye whip )

-or getting a mate to stand at varrock east bank for example and getting him to spam “buying [something shit] 1m!” and then you stand at center or near west bank and spamming “selling [something shit] 500k!” and of course greedy noob thinks to himself “easy 500k!” and buys it only for your friend to say “ah nvm already got”

Read full topic
